page.title: 06The Residents Survey (cont).
page.content: Among the few disadvantages cited to living on Lundy were:"difficulty of maintaining contact with friends and relations,lack of regular shopping, lack of a hairdesser,not being able to go away for the weekend,lack of a daily newspaper and library...." Most said they were not much affected by the weather.Some said they felt isolated at times.All had T.V.,Several had pets.Hobbies included swimming, walking,coastguard activities,reading, gardening,riding,knitting,photography and fishing.One of the lighthouse keepers actually puts ships into bottles!
